alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 21 at 5:19AM MST until November 21 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 1 to 3 miles with areas less than 1/2 mile possible in freezing fog. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and west Texas. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
